room_title: Escape room "Cartman's Escape Room" by Escape the Room Denver in Denver
review: The room in Escape the Room was well run. All of the props worked as they were meant too. The teens declared the Southpark room as the most fun one we have done.

room_title: Escape room "Cartman's Escape Room" by Escape the Room Denver in Denver
review: We chose to Cartman's escape room.  Puzzles were challenging and fun.  We didn't escape but many giggles were had along the way.  Room was wheelchair accessible and was able to be easily maneuvered around the room.  It was definitely a fun way to spend an afternoon with friends.  Knowledge of the show wasn't necessary for the puzzles.
